  • *Job Title**
Sr\. Data Scientist, Analytics and Metrics

Overview

The GBSC Analytics and Automation team is built upon strong contributors with leadership abilities, innovative mindsets and with strong business and technical acumen\.

The team thinks creatively, design smart, simple to use, cost\-effective solutions that empower our customer with actionable insights\.

Acting as an idea incubator supporting various GBSC initiatives the team provides in\-depth analysis and strategic guidance enabling process improvement and identifying ways to leverage data for answering business questions and driving operational efficiency\.

The GBSC Analytics an Automation innovate using new age technologies and data analysis techniques to discover actionable insights and communicate data in new and more effective ways for influencing business decisions, encouraging long\-term customer engagement, improving processes and productivity, and overall evolving the way we do business\.

Are you motivated to be a part of creative and innovative team?

Have you collaborated with a team of diverse skills and experience?

Do you have an entrepreneur mindset?

Role

Support multiple analytics projects and initiatives within GBSC and Mastercard\.

Identify, design and implement data and process automation solutions to support GBSC Operations and the global organization\.

Build and support an infrastructure to enable effectively working with large sets of unstructured and structured data\.

Develop new queries and Alteryx flows for extracting, transforming and analyzing data to address project requirements\.

Develop dashboards and reports that adhere to the visualization best practices and communicate a story\.

Participate in drafting documents and presentations for communicating innovations, ideas, or discoveries\.

Contribute to strengthening motivated, innovative and productive team that creates next generation analytics for the shared services center and Mastercard\.

Generate and implement ideas to continuously improve analytics and reporting services delivery\.

Work closely with finance teams and internal customers \(GBSC Operations\) to identify short\-term and long\-term objective alignment\.

All about You

Intellectual curiosity and enthusiasm to apply data to discover and solve business challenges and questions;

Problem solving mentality, resourcefulness and creativity in identifying solutions;

Strong interpersonal skills, ability to build professional relationship, influence and negotiate;

Full stack experience in data collection, aggregation, analysis, visualization, productizing and maintenance of analytics products;

Knowledge of advanced statistical analysis techniques and data mining methodologies\.

Proficiency with data preparation/ETL;

Strong knowledge of SQL, ability to write, execute and optimize performance of complex queries;

Expertise with information delivery and knowledge of data visualization techniques for preparing data discovery, operational and executive dashboards;

Experience developing complex reporting and analytics applications;

Ability to communicate complex quantitative analysis in a clear, precise, and actionable manner with both technical and non\-technical customers;

Data modeling;

Knowledge of a programming language like R or Python;

Experience with machine learning algorithms and methods;

Experience with predictive analytics and optimization models\.

Desirable Capabilities

Proficiency with Alteryx and Tableau;
